name: Duks
description:
The world is doomed and the global economic crisis ruined the currency
diary products are going to replace the global currency

Duks is a simple survivor type of minesweeper game



There are ducks on the field they will provide milk
Rescue ducks on the field to get milk!

Features

- A survivor type of minesweeper game
- Adorable eunuch man yelling sound when you fail
- You're paying this game that Windows already has
- Perfect killing time to break the record
- Rescue adorable ducks that quakcs!
